skill.name: clinical-decision-support
skill.description: Generate professional clinical decision support (CDS) documents for pharmaceutical and clinical research settings, including patient cohort analyses (biomarker-stratified with outcomes) and treatment recommendation reports (evidence-based guidelines with decision algorithms). Supports GRADE evidence grading, statistical analysis (hazard ratios, survival curves, waterfall plots), biomarker integration, and regulatory compliance. Outputs publication-ready LaTeX/PDF format optimized for drug development, clinical research, and evidence synthesis.
skill.summary: Generate professional clinical decision support (CDS) documents for pharmaceutical and clinical rese...
skill.author: K-Dense-AI

security_audit.summary: All static findings are false positives. The skill generates legitimate clinical research documents using standard Python libraries (pandas, numpy, scipy). The 'weak cryptographic algorithm' detections are medical terminology matches (e.g., hazard ratio, recommendation strength). 'External commands' flagged are markdown backticks for documentation formatting, not shell execution. Filesystem operations are standard document generation. No malicious code, credential exfiltration, or harmful patterns exist.

content.value_statement: Clinical researchers need evidence-based documents for drug development and regulatory submissions. This skill creates publication-ready clinical decision support documents with biomarker stratification and GRADE evidence grading.
actual_capabilities: Generate biomarker-stratified patient cohort analyses with statistical outcomes
Create evidence-based treatment recommendations with GRADE grading system
Produce publication-ready LaTeX/PDF documents for medical journals
Build clinical decision algorithms with TikZ flowchart visualization
Analyze survival data with Kaplan-Meier curves and hazard ratios
limitations: For group-level analyses only, not individual patient care plans
Requires de-identified patient data for HIPAA compliance
LaTeX compilation required for PDF output

use_cases.title: Drug Development Documentation
use_cases.description: Generate biomarker-stratified cohort analyses for Phase 2/3 trials and regulatory submissions

use_cases.title: Evidence-Based Guidelines
use_cases.description: Create treatment recommendation reports with GRADE grading for medical societies

use_cases.title: Submission Documents
use_cases.description: Produce publication-ready analyses for IND/NDA submissions and advisory boards

prompt_templates.title: Basic Cohort Analysis
prompt_templates.scenario: Analyze patient cohort by biomarker status
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a cohort analysis for 50 NSCLC patients stratified by PD-L1 expression levels. Include ORR, median PFS, and OS with hazard ratios comparing groups.

prompt_templates.title: Treatment Guidelines
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate GRADE-graded treatment recommendations for HER2+ metastatic breast cancer including first-line and subsequent therapies.

prompt_templates.title: Biomarker Integration
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze 75 GBM patients by molecular subtype with outcomes, biomarker profiles, and treatment response comparison.

prompt_templates.title: Decision Algorithm
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a TikZ flowchart for advanced NSCLC treatment decisions based on PD-L1, EGFR, ALK, and performance status with recommendations.

output_examples.input: Analyze 60 HER2+ breast cancer patients by hormone receptor status with trastuzumab-deruxtecan outcomes
output: Executive Summary: HR+/HER2+ vs HR-/HER2+ efficacy comparison
Kaplan-Meier survival curves with 95% confidence bands

output_examples.input: Create treatment recommendations for first-line EGFR-mutant NSCLC with osimertinib
output: Evidence from FLAURA trial: PFS 18.9 vs 10.2 months (HR 0.46)
Treatment algorithm flowchart with biomarker decision points
Adverse event profile and monitoring requirements

best_practices: Always include a complete executive summary on page 1 with 3-5 key findings in colored boxes
Use standard medical terminology and include trial names for evidence citations
Document statistical methods and include hazard ratios with 95% confidence intervals
anti_patterns: Do not include identifiable patient information - use de-identified data only
Avoid narrative text without data - support all recommendations with evidence tables
Do not skip the visual elements - include Kaplan-Meier curves and decision flowcharts

faq.question: What is the difference between this and treatment-plans skill?
faq.answer: This skill creates group-level analyses for research; treatment-plans creates individual patient care plans.

faq.question: Can I use real patient data?
faq.answer: Only de-identified data compliant with HIPAA Safe Harbor method with all 18 identifiers removed.

faq.question: What output format does it generate?
faq.answer: Publication-ready LaTeX documents that compile to PDF with professional tables and figures.

faq.question: Do I need LaTeX installed?
faq.answer: Yes, to compile PDF outputs. The skill generates LaTeX code that requires pdflatex compilation.

faq.question: What statistical methods are supported?
faq.answer: Kaplan-Meier survival analysis, hazard ratios, log-rank tests, Fisher's exact test, and GRADE evidence grading.

faq.question: Can it create decision flowcharts?
faq.answer: Yes, generates TikZ-based clinical decision algorithms and treatment pathway diagrams.
